meanings.definition: A mark or impression made by a stamp, seal, or hand.
meanings.sent1: The teacher praised the neat prints of the student's handwriting.
meanings.sent2: The detective examined the prints left at the crime scene.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy left tiny prints all over the freshly mopped floor.
meanings.sent4: Her unique style prints a lasting memory in everyone's mind.
meanings.sent5: The artist's prints on the canvas captured the essence of nature beautifully.

meanings.definition: A design or picture produced by a printing process.
meanings.sent1: The art gallery displayed colorful prints of famous paintings.
meanings.sent2: She bought a print of the city skyline to hang in her living room.
meanings.sent3: The child proudly showed off his finger-paint prints to his parents.
meanings.sent4: The intricate prints on the fabric resembled a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The photographer's prints of the landscape were breathtakingly detailed.

meanings.definition: To produce a copy of a document or image by pressing it onto a surface.
meanings.sent1: The office assistant prints multiple copies of the report for distribution.
meanings.sent2: He prints out the boarding pass before heading to the airport.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student prints a funny message on the school printer.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to perfection prints a flawless image every time.
meanings.sent5: The machine prints the text with precision and clarity.

meanings.definition: To leave a mark or impression on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The muddy shoes prints a trail across the clean floor.
meanings.sent2: The cat prints its paw on the wet paint of the fence.
meanings.sent3: The child giggles as he prints his hand on the foggy window.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness prints a warm feeling in everyone's heart.
meanings.sent5: The memory of their laughter prints joy in his mind forever.
